name: Impossiball (itch)
description:
Control BillyBall to restore seasons

You'll like Impossiball if you like challenging platformers, such as Super Monkey Ball

Team:

Game Design: Théo Gautier - Ivan Palla - Tom Rivaud - Stanislas Valin

Level Design: Paul Bonanomi- Stanislas Valin

Prog: Théo Gautier - Tom Rivaud

3D: Maxime Veyriat

Sound Design: Ivan Palla
